section.title: Time-Phased Production by Planner Code
section.para: To view time-phased production by Planner Code, select the "Time-Phased Production by Planner Code" option. The following screen will appear:
When displaying time-phased production by Planner Code, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to display time-phased production by Planner Code for all Warehouses.
Specify Warehouse whose time-phased production by Planner Code you want to display.
Select to display time-phased production for all Planner Codes.
Specify Planner Code whose time-phased production you want to display.
Enter a Planner Code pattern to select a range of Planner Codes.
Refine your search using Regular Expressions, as described in Pattern Matching with Regular Expressions"Topic: Pattern Matching with Regular Expressions".
Select to display Inventory Units of Measure.
Select to display Capacity Units of Measure.
Capacity Units: Select to display Alternate Capacity Units of Measure.
Select the Calendar you want to use for the report.
Associated Calendar periods will be displayed.
Select as many periods as you want to display. Selected periods correspond to Calendar specified in the "Calendar" field.

Select individual periods or groups of periods together. To select an individual period, highlight the period using your mouse button. The period is now selected. To select a sequence of periods, highlight the first in the sequence using your mouse button. Then, holding down the SHIFT key on your keyboard, highlight the last period in the sequence. The entire sequence is now selected. To select periods that are out of sequence (e.g., January, April, July, October), highlight the first period in the group. Then, holding down the CTRL key on your keyboard, highlight the next period you want to select. Continue highlighting periods with the CTRL key depressed until all desired periods are selected. The entire group is now selected.
Select to include inactive Item Sites in the display.
Display lists time-phased production by Planner Code, using the specified parameters.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Select to generate the display, using the specified parameters.
Start date and end date must be entered for calculation to proceed. Results will be displayed in the "Production" display.
Runs the report associated with this screen.
Select to submit report to the Batch Manager. For additional information, see the Submitting Reports and Jobs to the Batch Manager"Topic: Submitting Reports and Jobs to the Batch Manager".
